title: A discourse of English poetrie Together, with the authors iudgment, touching the reformation of our English verse. By VVilliam VVebbe. Craduate [sic].
author: Webbe, William.
publisher: By Iohn Charlewood for Robert Walley,
notes: Includes verse translations of the first two Bucolics of Virgil.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
